IUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg> - Interface in model
The strategy that runs when a Ball updates its state.
IUpdateStrategy.NullFactory<TDispMsg> - Class in model
A factory for a typed null strategy object.
Usage: instantiate this factory class using the desired TDispMsg type and then call its make() method to create the correctly typed null strategy object.
IUpdateStrategyFac<TDispMsg> - Interface in model
An interface that defines a factory that instantiates a specific IUpdateStrategy
IViewCtrlAdapter - Interface in model
The communications interface the model uses to talk to the view for non-repetitive control tasks such as getting information for the instantiation of a ball.
IViewUpdateAdapter - Interface in model
This interface is used for the fast, repetitive updating communications to the model, such as those needed during a timer tick.
